channel.title: [PI] Shops: Buy "X AMOUNT" [317]
channel.description:
Hello guys,
Is there a way to sell an amount of items by clicking "Buy X" and then enter an amount of items. Same as by banking items, or withdrawing.
Is there any tutorial on this, or have a clue on how to do this?
Thanks and regards,

item.title: [PI] Shops: Buy "X AMOUNT" [317]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

I think packet 27 is the ‘Imput Amount’ packet

utilize it.

Read full topic
